titles.title: A resolution making minority party appointments to the Select Committee on Ethics.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Appoints Senators Mitch McConnell (Vice Chairman), Ted Stevens (vice, Trent Lott), and Bob Smith (vice, Slade Gorton) as the minority party membership of the Senate Select Committee on Ethics.
